extendedInfo.description: The Summer and Spring versions have been released!Try the demo version first to make sure you're happy with it!"Lonely Tree" is a live wallpaper designed with the Nexus 10 in mind, with high-resolution textures and a tablet-friendly holo-themed settings panel. It looks and feels beautiful on standard sized phones as well.The winter nature scene reacts dynamically to the wind speed range selected in the settings, with the tree gently swaying in the wind, the bushes fluttering, and the snowflakes becoming faster and more streaky.Almost everything is customizable including the strength of the wind, the amount of snow, and the size and position of the tree. You can optionally add Christmas lights to the tree, and change it to night-time to really see them glow."Easy on the phoneâs memory and is just soothing to watch"www.droid-life.com"Grab a cup of hot chocolate, sit back and enjoy a beautiful winter scene"www.DroidApps.org"Itâs a simple, somber winter scene thatâs fully customizable and very beautiful"www.android-apps.comTO USE:Long Press On Desktop->Wallpapers->Live WallpapersSome features I plan to add over the next few months:* Secondary trees in background* Brightness/Contrast settings* More complex cloud layers* Snowflakes in the snowdrifts* More natural tree branch movements (independent of each other)* Wind gusts* Optional fence in front of the tree* Birds (or other animals) flying in the backgroundAnd over the next year:* Other seasons (Spring, Summer, Fall)* Different weather types (sun, fog, etc...)

reviews.title: Gorgeous
reviews.comment: This is wonderful on my tablet! I\'m loving the summer one! I know the tree is the center piece, but I love the clouds. Very natural and happy looking clouds!! :-)
reviews.author: diane marie

reviews.title: Kind of choppy compared to the Demo version
reviews.comment: The demo was smooth, the paid seems choppy (even in 60 fps). I don\'t know what is the problem here. Other than that, I really love the custom semi-realistic animations. I can\'t wait to see birds added to this in the future!
reviews.author: Matoro Zeliph

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I been looking for a wallpaper for my galaxy nexus and wen I saw this live wallpaper I had to buy it . great wallpaper ... I love it ... And one of the greatest thing is the Dev is always improving it.   ..... GReat buy !!!
reviews.author: Rigo Mancha

reviews.title: Great!
reviews.comment: I cant believe you added more seasons  its great! Loved it with just the winter setting . Best Lwp ever!
reviews.author: Martin steers

reviews.title: I had the demo and was eyeing this
reviews.comment: Then the sale came and I bought it straight away!
reviews.author: Charlie Marschall

reviews.title: Great lwp
reviews.comment: Was able to get the wallpaper to work by freezing some other lwps installed, lwp picker must be force closing because it can\'t handle the amount of lwps I have installed ... New updated version doesn\'t work on my S3. Since I updated my \" lwp picker\"  force closes before I can select any wallpaper. When I Uninstall the app I do not get the force close.   Please fix. I was excited about the update until I found out I can\'t use it or any other lwp when it is installed.
reviews.author: Jason Lisowski

reviews.title: Pretty
reviews.comment: Great wallpaper
reviews.author: mark auxier

reviews.title: My favorite live wallpaper
reviews.comment: Nice work!  I used to leave winter as my wallpaper permanently.  The Summer option is my new favorite.
reviews.author: Danny Franchow

reviews.comment: Pretty cool!
reviews.author: Neil McEachin

reviews.title: Update
reviews.comment: Summer is here! I get into a trance when I look at the leaves swaying back and forth. All I have is one suggestion. Please add a sunset sky.
reviews.author: Kyle Cordiano

reviews.title: Beautiful and lite
reviews.comment: This is a simplistically beautiful live wallpaper. It\'s gorgeous but doesn\'t forget that it\'s a background.  The new spring season is nice, maybe we can get an option later for random or cycling seasons.
reviews.author: Christopher Kroupa

reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.comment: Both winter and spring are lovely. I really appreciate how this isn\'t in over the top, hd hypercolor. This live wallpaper is more subtle yet has lots of depth, which is rare in mobile graphics. The lighting in the clouds is naturalistic and super beautiful. I quite like the snow and rain, sort of moody in a pretty way. I especially appreciate how spring is early spring. Great job.
reviews.author: Wendy Murray

reviews.title: Best LWP on the Play store!!!
reviews.comment: This is the most gorgeous lwp to come out yet and the updates make it even more worthwhile. Eager to see what summer and fall look like. Totally worth the money.
reviews.author: Christopher Beecher

reviews.title: Love it especially immediately hot weather
reviews.comment: Wonderful
reviews.author: Brenda Owen Jones

reviews.title: Best Live Wallpaper
reviews.comment: Spring looks great! I can\'t wait for Summer and Fall!
reviews.author: Ryan Sharp

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Its dark, mysterious, cool, epic and most of all no lag and battery friendly.  I love the new features (spring theme) and I can\'t wait for other themes.  I suppose dev could cook up live weather in the future
reviews.author: Gerald Jolonius

reviews.comment: Just grate.....
reviews.author: Tsotne Meladze

reviews.title: Beautiful!
reviews.comment: Works flawlessly on my Nexus 7 and looks stunning. The only live wallpaper I\'ve bought and it\'s money well spent. Absolutely brilliant! Looks brill on my S3 too. Only thing I could think of adding is other seasonal effects so we don\'t have to have snow all the time
reviews.author: Jamie Hunt

reviews.title: Wow!
reviews.comment: One of the best live wallpapers I\'ve ever seen. So simple yet so crisp and elegant. You Must download this!
reviews.author: Gleb Morrison

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Very nice look, reminds me of all my winter snow trips. Reminds me of the old Winter Flock wallpaper. I\'d suggest looking at adding the bird effects if anything, they were cool.
reviews.author: Philip Wroblewski
